trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of objects involved in concurrency conflicts.
trans-unit.target: 傳回涉及並行衝突的物件集合。

trans-unit.source: In the following example that retrieves information about objects in conflict, `db.ChangeConflicts` represents the collection of those objects.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，擷取發生衝突，物件的相關資訊`db.ChangeConflicts`表示這些物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Removes all conflicts from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除所有的衝突。

trans-unit.source: The specified conflict.
trans-unit.target: 指定的衝突。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a given conflict is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定特定的衝突是否為集合的成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the specified conflict is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的衝突是集合的成員，則傳回 true。

trans-unit.source: The array to copy to.
trans-unit.target: 要複製到其中的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The array index where the copy is to start.
trans-unit.target: 陣列索引，從這裡開始複製。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection to an array.
trans-unit.target: 複製集合的項目至陣列。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.ChangeConflictCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Data.Linq.ChangeConflictCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of conflicts in the collection
trans-unit.target: 傳回集合中衝突的數目

trans-unit.source: integer
trans-unit.target: 整數

trans-unit.source: Returns the enumerator for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Index in the collection of the item in conflict.
trans-unit.target: 衝突中項目集合內的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns an item in conflict.
trans-unit.target: 傳回衝突中的項目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.ObjectChangeConflict" /> representing the item in conflict.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.ObjectChangeConflict" />，表示衝突中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The conflict to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的衝突。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the specified conflict is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否從集合中移除指定的衝突。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.ObjectChangeConflict" /> is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.ObjectChangeConflict" /> 從集合中移除，則傳回 true。

trans-unit.source: Resolves all conflicts in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 解決集合中所有的衝突。

trans-unit.source: One of the options available in <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode" /> 中其中一個可用的選項。

trans-unit.source: Resolves all conflicts in the collection by using the specified strategy.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的策略，解決集合中所有的衝突。

trans-unit.source: The strategy to use to resolve the conflict.
trans-unit.target: 用於解決衝突的策略。

trans-unit.source: If true, automatically resolves conflicts that result from a modified object that is no longer in the database.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 true，則自動解決因已修改物件不再位於資料庫中所造成的衝突。

trans-unit.source: Resolves all conflicts in the collection by using the specified strategy.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的策略，解決集合中所有的衝突。

trans-unit.source: The item to add.
trans-unit.target: 要新增的項目。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.Add(`0)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.Add(`0)" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.ChangeConflictCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Data.Linq.ChangeConflictCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果該集合為唯讀，則傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.ChangeConflictCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Data.Linq.ChangeConflictCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Name of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Index of the array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array.
trans-unit.target: 將集合複製至陣列。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 如果已同步處理對集合的存取 (執行緒安全)，則傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.ChangeConflictCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Data.Linq.ChangeConflictCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件，這個物件可用來同步處理對集合的存取。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.ChangeConflictCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Data.Linq.ChangeConflictCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that iterates through a collection.
trans-unit.target: 逐一查看集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.ChangeConflictCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Data.Linq.ChangeConflictCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
